channel.title: Quality on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Quality on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Principles and Practices QA and QC
item.description:
Knowledge of Principles and Practices of Quality Assurance and Quality Control in a Laboratory
Question 5: The GRL has procedures and work instructions that explain the correct methods for carrying out various tests that are conducted in the lab. Why is it necessary to follow these instructions?

item.title: Internal Audits
item.description: Question 6: Why are Internal Audits conducted on the Quality Management System?

item.title: Key Indicators for Successful Quality
item.description: Question 7: Describe the key indicators for successfully maintaining the quality control system in ISO 17025 accredited laboratory?

item.title: Non-renewal Accreditation
item.description: Question 8: ISO 17025 accreditation of a test laboratory can be discontinued by the accreditation body. List the possible scenarios that could result in non-renewal of ISO 17025 accreditation.
